website_summaries.verdict: A very convenient little tool made from plastic to eliminate the risk of cutting yourself instead of your avocado.
pros: Slices, removes pits and scoops out the soft interior
No sharp edges to cut your hands
cons: Slicer function is not very sharp and can be challenging with avocados that are not quite ripe

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! Do not buy from seller Scott Bertram!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! Know which seller you are buying from! Do not buy from “Scott Bertram”! We bought our original slicer from Amazon years ago (left in the picture), it worked great until we broke it. Ordered again and it was FAKE (right in the picture)! As you can clearly tell the quality difference and lack of OXO logo. We realize our order was sold by “Scott Bertram” instead of Amazon, because his price was 10cents lower, and was automatically selected by Amazon system since we clicked buy-now and did not change the seller ourselves. Definitely returning it!
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Received a FAKE Avocado Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I received a fake item, like many other reviewers. The pictures show the quality of the counterfeit item, with unfinished edges, bad rubber moulding fit, and no of OXO logo stamped into the back. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised! You will look like an amazing chef to your family and friends!
customer_reviews.text: Avocado? Yes, Please! This tool is awesome. Easy to cut open the fruit. Pit remover works well, just push onto the pit and give it a twist, and the pit pops right out. The best part is the slicer. Makes beautiful slices for a great presentation (see attached photo of slices, ok, one side came out perfect, I kind of gummed up the other side). The tool can then be used to scrape any remaining fruit out of the skin. Really happy I bought this tool!
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: A knife and spoon is 10 times better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be so cool to have perfect avacado slices. Following are the reasons for a poor review. - you cannot sharpen the plastic cutter (compared to my knives it's a blunt force object - tearing the avacado's skin - The internal cutting blades are too thick - most of the time they just mush the inside of the Avacado -
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kadish

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting one of these for a while but there are so many out there it took me a bit to decide. I found this one is wonderful! And worked better than I expected! I don’t think they could come up with anything better. If anything ever happens to this one I’d get another, but this is made so well I’ll doubt I’ll need to.
customer_reviews.author: MrsGinaTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, design not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Not so great, the scooper part works great but the multi slicer that's supposed to cut the avocado into several thinner pieces just doesn't work. The plastic "dicers" are just too thick, you'd need something a bit stronger and thinner to do the job. Really made a mess out of the avocado, too which made for more clean up. Good idea but still have some tweaking to do with the design.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: the slicer sucks
customer_reviews.text: I like the knife part where it is used to cut open the avocado. The most useful part is the one that takes the seeds out. It comes of very handy. However the slicer SUCKS. Its not sharp so completely destroyed the avocado when you use it to cut and scrape out of the shell. I am disappointed the tool only delivers half of what it promised to.
customer_reviews.author: Duke_angryfluff

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen tool. It couldn’t be easier to use. Those dang avocado pits that are slippery suckers can’t get away from the 3 tines that hold onto them. My avocado slices are actually slices and not mush after I mutilated the fruit in the past. I did wash mine in the top rack of my dishwasher with no problems. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli L. Wright-bobholz

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have one tool but I don't like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh, for some reason I thought this would beat a knife and spoon. Nice to have one tool but I don't like the pit blades, they don't really grab the pit but if your not careful they grab you. I have yet to have the pit blades grab on the first try, and when using the tool you must be aware of them because they can get to your hand. Just as easy taking the pit with the knife you use to open the avocado. The scoop / slice end of the too; is nice and works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Can't touch a kitchen knife and large spoon.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is in no way Superior to a knife and large spoon to slice the avocado in half, chop into the seed, twist, and remove, and then scoop out each half using the large spoon. If you then want to slice the avocado into pieces, there are many ways to do this with a knife. It takes no longer than with this tool and is much more precise and less messy.
customer_reviews.author: TMART

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, but a Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke, I was excited when this came in but it was a complete let down. The knife part works great, and the center portion to remove the pit works, depending in the size. I've had a few smaller avocados that it did not work on at all. Beyond that it was really a waste of money as the part to scoop the avocado out into slices is basically worthless, but if you do power through, it is then a pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: megpez14

customer_reviews.title: The tool you never knew you needed
customer_reviews.text: I like avocados. However, I found myself not buying them as frequently as I’d like to eat them because, frankly, they’re a messy, dangerous, pain-in-the-butt to open. Not anymore! From the plastic knife (no more accidental cuts!) to the handy scooper (such a time saver!), this little gadget is well worth the room it takes up in my utensil drawer. The only issue I had was that the pit-puller does not work on smaller and not evenly halved avocados, but it works nicely on regular sized ones and/or ones that have been properly halved. Overall, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must-have
customer_reviews.text: This avocado slicing tool is a total game changer... I go through at least one avocado a day, so this little thing has made it significantly easier and faster to prep them! It’s very simple to use, and it seems exceptionally sturdy. The pit removing part of the tool is incredibly helpful. And the slices it creates are the perfect size/thickness! Despite the exceptional quality, I would be wary of putting it in the dishwasher. Luckily it is easy to clean, so this isn’t really an issue. I am a big enough fan of this tool that I have since purchased multiple for friends/family to use, and an additional one for myself to keep on hand. 5/5 stars, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedi GraceTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent avocado tool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading an article about emergency room visits as a result of avocado cutting mishaps and subsequently questioning my own knife skills. This product is well designed and good quality. The "knife" part is sharp enough to easily cut through the skin and flesh of a ripe avocado, and the pit remover is just genius - no more whacking the pit with a knife and hoping it catches, or digging out a pit and ruining the surrounding flesh. The slicer is good, too. Sliced avocados have a professional presentation.
customer_reviews.author: dbc79

customer_reviews.title: Better all-in-ones exist, or you can just use utensils.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy 3-in-1, but I'm generally disappointed with it because the section that scoops/cuts the flesh of the avocado has two problems: first, the avocado has to be nearly the exact size as the part used to cut the flesh, which sticks to that part regardless of the size of the avocado. It's messy to remove the fruit afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cool guac tool!
customer_reviews.text: Those recipes for guacamole toast were calling my name but I had no idea how to cut a guac up without losing a finger. Enter the OXO Quacamole tool which is really way cool! After carefully cleaning it, I followed the step by step instructions on the product packaging and "voila!" - awesome looking fresh quac ready for topping on my veggie burger (no, not the toast this time). Love this thing! Why did I wait so long to buy it??? The design is well thought out and executed. The color is quite nice too. If you are looking for a fast way to prep a guac, think this may just be the tool for you.
customer_reviews.author: kitkats

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: We bought this thinking it would be perfect. What a disappointment! The blade is too short and thick to cut properly, The pit remover did nothing as it is too deep to grab the seed without musing into the fruit itself. But the biggest disappointment was the scoop. It just turned into mush. Did not remove all the fruit and did not cut it as stated. Just turned into a big mess! Returned this. All you really need is just a sharp knife and spoon to do the job. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Try it!  You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cutting an avocado is easy enough to do with a knife so I didn’t get what all the hype was about with this tool...... But “sheltering in place” had me binge shopping (don’t judge).... Since Amazon has a great return policy I thought I would give it a try. Soooo glad I purchased this! It is an incredible little tool. I should have purchased this years ago. I can slice up an avocado for a salad in under a minute, get perfect size slices and use the ENTIRE avocado. I love it so much I bought more to give as hostess gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brougham

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal but sufficiently functional
customer_reviews.text: Here is the bottom line - in order to make this thing from plastic, it had to be made thicker. While this is less of a problem for the cutting knife, the slicing elements are just too chunky to slide through every avocado. Some of the fruit sticks to the slicer and can't be rinsed easily every time. If you miss some avocado bits (which is easy since the slicer is conveniently colored in avocado color), they will dry up and become that much more difficult to clean (a small brush would be useful). I'd say - metal is probably better. BTW, it's great for removing pits!
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: So i was influenced by friends and family to buy this product...and I am so happy i did!!! It takes the scare out of potentially cutting your hand using a regular knife to remove the avocado pit. It is super easy to clean and surprisingly comfortable to use in hand when cutting the avocado. I truly was not expecting this product to work as well as it did or to really be much different than a normal knife (if it's not broke, why fix it...?) BUT i am so happy I finally bought it ! This will definitely be on my list of items I gift to people in the future! Definitely a kitchen gadget worth investing in!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Clever kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I eat avocado nearly every day, but I’m sometimes frustrated by the mess to my nails that results from peeling and slicing the ripened fruit. This device is perfect. The plastic blade cuts through the skin with ease. The pit remover takes the pit out cleanly. (I just smack the blades lightly onto the pit and give a quick turn). Best of all is the slicer, which quickly and cleanly gives uniform slices for use on sandwiches, etc. If I want chunks for a salad, I simply cut the slices in half. When I’m done I just toss it in the dishwasher. Far less mess compared to peeling the old-fashioned way. Fewer avocado stains under my fingernails!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The round section that helps you remove the pit works well, but not the scooper part. I rarely use it sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Cilka Castro

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I'd Invented This
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tool I've ever bought and/or used. It's second only to my "Rambolina" Swiss Army Knife, given to me by my late mother. This tool does everything! It so easily cuts the avocado, removes the pitt and allows one to very easily push it out into the trash bin with a simple tap of your index finger; then allows you to easily and thoroughly remove the avocado fruit/meat in nice slices. If I could only take one thing while deserted on a tropical island -- other than Rambolina -- it would likely be this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Saves times, reduces mess...just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Makes preparing guacamole an easier, less messy task. I use it frequently and it makes preparation of avocados much less work and effort. Reduces mess on my hands, on counters, etc It also slices avocados nicely for inclusion in sandwiches. The tool makes for nice, even slices for presentation, too, when I serve avocados plain. Avocados are good for you so anything to make them easier to prepare and serve is a win. I enjoy giving this product as a gift. Anything that promotes good health is a thoughtful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Chick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was better off with my knife and using a spoon. Maybe all the avocados I am buying are bad but this tool doesn't seem to help substantially at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard212

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool!
customer_reviews.text: This tool cuts through tough avocado skin and does the most amazing job of removing the pit. The cutting edge is safe to the touch but it can pierce avocado skin easily. I have always struggled with removing the pit inside an avocado, taking away some of the avocado. But the feature that removes the pit does so cleanly and without effort. The only drawback is the part of the tool that removes the avocado from the skin. The grids hold onto some of the fruit and it is a little burdensome to get all the avocado away from the grid feature.
customer_reviews.author: Therese B. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool!
customer_reviews.text: How difficult is it to slice open an avocado, remove the pit, grab a spoon & scoop it out of the peel? Not difficult. So when I bought this tool on an impulse, I thought it isn’t that expensive so if it doesn’t work, I can at least use the ‘knife’ portion & it wouldn’t be a total loss. I love this thing! I still admit it is not difficult doing it the old way but I am freaky fast with this & I get near perfect slices. It goes in the dishwasher for an easy cleanup. Guess what everyone is getting for a stocking stuffer next Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fast tool for processing avacados
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes making guacamole a very fast and enjoyable process. My only fault with it is it is not very easy to clean, especially if it doesn't get tossed in the dishwater immediately after use. Anyway as long as the avo is fairly soft, this thing makes short work of scooping and slicing the flesh from out of the skin. Beats peeling. Makes nice chunks for salads or tacos or burgers or whatever. Great for guac, like I said. If you like avacado, you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Growley Monster

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s easier to use a knife. Harder to clean than a knife and a waste of time. I never use it and I use a lot of avocados. It is just taking up space in my drawer. I was surprised because I bought from this company before and was very happy with their products. This one is just not for me, takes up too much Unnecessary time to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it is advertized
customer_reviews.text: The slicer part of the package didn’t turn out to be as easy as I thought. It just butchers the avocado. I wish the slicer (grill) was thinner then maybe it would cut the avocado nicely (like maybe steal bars instead of plastic). It cuts the skin perfectly without issues. And also removes the pit. Only issue is the slicer doesn't work as I was expecting but that's actually the main reason I purchased this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to "work" to get the pit out of avocados, and also trying to peel them in order to slice them up. This little slicer does it all. The one end slices the avocado in half. The middle part has small blades that easily removes the pit. The other end removes the avocado meat in neat even slices. I love this too. The only thing I would change is if it could be just a little bit thinner to make it easier for my arthritic hands to manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Nana

customer_reviews.title: I guess 1 1/2 out of 3 isn't bad
customer_reviews.text: Almost 2 out of 3 features work. Great at cutting in half. Have occasional problems getting the pit out. Although it slices well, I have 2 issues with the slicer: Trader Joe's "teeny tiny" avos are too small to slice well (too much fruit left behind); I haven't been able to figure out how to get the slices out without getting my hand messy and the slices break. Needs some sort of "release" so slices can come out easily. Also, a bit fiddly to get the slicer part clean when using a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gold

customer_reviews.title: 4 Reasons Why I Gave This 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other avocado tools, this one is by bar the best. It has 3 functions. It easily cuts the avocado outer skin. It easily remove the large seed by gripping where you see the round hole in the tool, and it easily slices the avocado in serving bite sizes. Lastly, it's highly durable and manufactured well. That's why I gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Nashville TN

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept.  Flawed product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept since I've came close to slicing my hand a few times removing avocado seeds. However it's really hard to clean. It says it is top rack dishwasher safe and it is not. I completely bent the serrated like slicer so now to use I have to use a seperate knife to cut the avocado open. By that time i usually just take my chances with removing the seed by the same knife. The slicing feature is really awesome but only if it actually worked in the dishwasher because washing this thing by hand is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. In order to get nice looking slices the avocado has to be the perfect ripeness. Does not work if the avocado is a tiny bit too ripe or if the avocado is a little hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: This product is great overall but after buying it
customer_reviews.text: This product is great overall but after buying it, I'm wondering why I bought it. I can use a knife just as easily. I suppose this tool makes things easier for those with arthritis or simpler for younger kids who want to help out, but overall... probably didn't need to purchase. Still giving 4 stars because the product itself is very well made and shipped really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having a heart attack every time I hacked at an avocado pit with a sharp knife to get it out so I got this instead. It works perfectly. It cuts the avocado smoothly with no issue, takes the pit out cleanly, and makes perfect slices! I just kind of squeeze the avocado while I run the slicer so I don’t leave extra on the sides. This is a safe and easy way to do things.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my husband because we eat avocados almost every day now. It streamlines the process of preparing an avocado. My husband uses it to cut open the avocado and take the pit out, but we haven't used the part to slice the avocado. This kitchen utensil is an all in one and eliminates the need for a knife and a spoon. It is a lot safer to use than a knife. The product is very high quality and washes up great in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great, functional & safe product!  A must have in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Avocado knife! It works great and is so much safer to use than a regular knife. I purchased after my bestie accidentally stabbed herself in the hand cleaning an avocado with a kitchen knife. She had to have emergency surgery because it cut a nerve. That avocado cost her several thousand dollars. I've also have purchased several of these knives as a just because gift and everyone love them! My bestie was the first recipient and she now safely enjoys cutting her avocados!🥑🥑🥑
customer_reviews.author: Tana R. Granberry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife didn't think this was going to be "awesome" since she can do all of the same things with a knife that won't take up more space in the drawer (she's very practical that way), but for only $10, this genuinely makes things a lot easier and after trying it, she agreed, not a bad thing to have around (that's as good as I'm going to get from her, so I'll take it). Help reduce the risk of you getting a cut, and makes preparing guacamole or slices for hamburgers such a breeze! You've done it again Oxo! Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: SuperRob2004

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for a Christmas present because we both eat a lot of avocados. Works GREAT!!! I'd highly recommend it! Use the slicer to slice directly through to the core, twist gently to pull it apart, use the core remover and gently push down onto the core, gently twist and the core comes right out, pop it out in to the trash with your finger throuth the little hole in the middle, then use the scooper/slicer end to scoop out each half of the avocado. That can be a bit messy when scooping if the avocado is softer and ripened, but this tool really works well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Manos

customer_reviews.title: Total Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is a must! It cut right into my avocado, got the seed out with perfect ease, and hulls out the inside. I've always struggled with getting the seeds out, but this was a breeze. I had a little bit of difficulty hulling it out the first time, but I think it's just me putting too much pressure. Once I use it more I think I'll get used to it. But this is a total game changer for someone like me!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Alvacado hand
customer_reviews.text: I just wished I had bought this sooner. It works. I can’t tell you how many times my knife has slipped off the seed when I tried to stab it with the knife. Every one should have one for your own safety. Everything on it works How easy to use. It’s also very reasonable priced. Just think how much it would cost for one visit to emergency and oh the pain while goin thru this.I think the Doctors call this Emergency the Alvacado hand. They get a lot of this. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Yummy10

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: SO many positive reviews made me think I would absolutely love this tool (I eat avocados almost daily) ... it was a major let down from the usual paring knife I use. I found that the cutting tool was a little easier but the piece to get out the pit never worked properly and the other end only worked if the avocado was really ripe. Unfortunately I will not be using this.
customer_reviews.author: snread

customer_reviews.title: Perfect avocado pieces.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is. The green knife thingy is sharp enough to penetrate avocado skin, the slicer is convenient and makes it easy to get everything, out and does the job of slicing it for you, but the pit remover is ok. Gotta use some pressure to get the teeth onto the pit then the pit gets stuck in the teeth and you gotta pull it off or knock it off.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vang

customer_reviews.title: So perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect item I’ve gotten three of them as gifts for people now after I bought it for myself I use avocados multiple times a week nearly daily. In the beginning of coronavirus I stab myself really bad getting a pit out so I instantly went on Amazon and bought this total life changeryour best kitchen gadget I bought
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this tool would really do all that it is supposed to but it really isn't the swiftest tool. Seems like it should be a little bigger. I still haven't mastered getting the avocado seed out with this product nor getting a clean scooped slice with the slicing side. It shouldn't be difficult to use but I keep trying because we eat a lot of avocados.
customer_reviews.author: Tamela D'Amico

customer_reviews.title: SENT A KNOCKOFF PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a knock off version of the OXO slicer. I’ve purchased it before and it broke in a move so I wanted to replace it. The real version is sturdy and otherwise strong. What was sent to me is flimsy, has pieces of plastic falling off and generally looks not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to use. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, price. I love this tool, lol, I think I may have to buy my husband his own!! It makes prepping an avocado so much easier,faster, especially with arthritic hands. OXO makes top quality products and the prices are good. These would make great gifts, especially for showers, weddings. I highly recommend this product. It is dishwasher safe but I just wash mine by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: Avacados do not stand a chance
customer_reviews.text: I wondered about the pit when I saw the actual size of this tool. I love the grip, size, and sturdiness. I tried the pit remover the first time thinking this will not really work, but it does. I love the easy way the "knife" portion cuts through the avocado skin and the other side helps slice up the avocado easily with one swipe per half. Very easy to use, dishwasher safe, and I am pleased with the size in my hand, the grip and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Magick1

customer_reviews.title: great all-in-one tool to cut and de-pit an avocado
customer_reviews.text: The de-pitting tool is much more comforting to use than stabbing the pit with the edge of a knife. The portion to cut avocado slices is convenient too. At first I was concerned about how it would fit avocados of different sizes, but have realized you can gently shape the avocado in the palm of your hand to fit the tool. Definitely a convenience item more than a necessity, but it's small and worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was super-skeptical about this tool, figuring it would be a piece of junk due to being all plastic. We were both pleasantly surprised when this thing turned out to be one of the handiest pieces we've purchased from Amazon in several years. The plastic blade is surprisingly sturdy and sharp, slicing through the avocado skin with ease. I used the pit extractor once and thought it was way messier than it should've been, but it does work. I don't like my avocado sliced up, so I've never used the end opposite of the blade. This thing is always on our counter, though, and is used every single time we eat avocado.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and thought it wasn't something I'd ever use. BUT, I love it! I love Avocados so I eat them a lot. The first time I used this tool I fell in love! One tool does everything and does it well. Best of all there is only one thing to wash! I would highly recommend this if you eat as many avocados as I do!
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Has ups and downs
customer_reviews.text: The pitter part of this tool is pretty awesome, much less risky than using a knife and works well. However, the scoop part is just okay, the shape of it is great but the avocado just gets gunked up because of the raised outer edge that stops you from getting it out cleanly. Typically I use the scoop to get it out of the skin but then I need something else to get it out of the tool.
customer_reviews.author: name_not_returned

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only tool I'll use for avocados. After cutting myself with a large knife trying to remove the pit, I found this tool several years ago. The pit remover is a cinch to use, and the knife edge is sharp enough to cut the avocado. The only part I don't use is the slicer side. I just bought my son one of these because he uses avocados every day.
customer_reviews.author: sandivegas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The plastic knife edge cuts the avocado easily. The seed removal item works well. The slicer does a fair job. The avocado slices tend to slick in the slicer. You have to push the slices through the slicer with a finger or spoon. Clean up is super easy. It is better than using a knife and spoon to open and slice up an avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Cool Travel

customer_reviews.title: One and done!
customer_reviews.text: This little kitchen tool is all you will need when it comes to everything avocado! I have since purchased this item for a friend as a gift and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chase E McKee

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful that this would work after reading some of the reviews; however, I must say I was impressed. It easily cut and removed the pit. I have not perfected getting the fleshy part out using the tool yet, but I am working on that aspect of it. The tool seems much wider than the avocados that I have access too, so it is difficult to effectively and efficiently remove the fleshy part. Overall, it does simplify a task that was once quite time consuming for me to complete!
customer_reviews.author: Seacgrav

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, saw a video and the operation matches the video
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a little surprise present for my wife who loves avocados! I saw a video on twitter about this nifty tool and I went to look it up. This thing is really awesome, it makes opening and slicing an avocado so simple. Everything that is difficult or messy is fixed with this specific tool. I've never come across anything like it before but its definitely worth it if you like/eat avocados on an even semi-regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Jimster480

customer_reviews.title: Got after my avocado accident....
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally cut myself with a small knife after attempting to take the pit out of the avocado. Luckily it wasn’t too bad, but then my friend told me her daughter had a severe cut (rushed to emergency) while attempting to cut an avocado. This device is great, but you still have to be careful with the plastic knife area. Thanks OXO!
customer_reviews.author: HE

customer_reviews.title: Great idea if it totally worked!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product was very sturdy. I liked the feature that made the pit easy to remove, and I liked the ease with which the hard plastic "knife" easily penetrated the hard avocado skin through the meat to the pit. However, when trying to use the rounded blade with cross blades to remove the pulp I found it a little difficult to get the specialized blades to cleanly remove and cut into strips that yummy pulp. Not easy and a bit messy. Clean-up was awkward and time consuming for such a small utensil.
customer_reviews.author: verna rankin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I eat avocados' all the time. This is great. I can cut the avocado and then get the pit out without to much of a hassle (usually). There is occasionally the avacado that isn't fully ripe or the seed doesn't want to twist, but it saves my knives from getting dings in the blade or trying to get the seed out with a spoon and you lose several bits of avocado. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Edson Scott Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: It's great for avoiding avocado hand/ removing the pit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this primarily for the avocado pit remover design - and it's great. I have cut myself a few times doing the 'tap the knife on the pit' technique. And it works great for that purpose. The little green knife part works surprisingly well for slicing the avocado open. The only part of this design is the 3rd part - which cuts the avocado into slices. It works only if the avocado is at the exact right ripeness level (not too mushy and not too hard) and is hard to clean, so I don't end up using it. However, I would definitely buy this again just for the pit remover part.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Gorokhovsky

customer_reviews.title: Useful provided the avocado is at the right ripeness.
customer_reviews.text: Some residue which stick to the corners of the slicing slats are difficult to remove. Clean slices of the avocado can only be made when the fruit is at the right ripeness as if it is too ripe and soft, the slices will stick to the slats and fall apart. You can't cut yourself with the plastic blade so it's still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga

customer_reviews.title: The Most Useful Unnecessary Tool
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I needed a tool for an avocado. But the first time I used it I had an easily sliced, pitted, and even uniform slices-sitting on a plate in less than a minute! Rinsed under the tap and done. BooM! I now wonder how I was able to prep avocados before...
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: I BOUGHT IT FOR EVERYONE
customer_reviews.text: I don't care if this was debunked that knife skills are better. Of course they are but this little thing is AWESOME. This is so much easier than using a knife and faster. Clean up is crazy easy too because it is plastic pieces. I've sliced my hand open using a knife with avocados before and I did slip once with this because I didn't realize how sharp it is but I didn't cut my hand open! I've given this to chefs before and they think it's it joke but when they use it, they actually do appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great Slicer and Pit remover
customer_reviews.text: We really love this product, I didn't expect it to work that well. We really like the simple design it cuts great and the pit remover works good, one really good thing is that you really have a lot lower risk of cutting your self compared to kitchen chefs knife or other knives. The scoop cutting is Ok, But it does the job, you could also use a butter knife and a spoon. It is not perfect but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana DIY

customer_reviews.title: Not really necessary but works well
customer_reviews.text: Really, is this necessary? No, but it works well to slice the avocado. I still use a knife to halve the fruit and take out the pit -- old habit, and I really could use that knife to slice the avocado. I have not mastered the pit remover. Tough to clean but comes out of the dw spic and span. If you like avocados and gadgets, this might be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It made it all so easy! Honestly
customer_reviews.text: I used to laugh at this kind of product until my friend was using hers. It made it all so easy! Honestly, I can't believe someone as clumsy as me was functioning without it. Where I used to use a knife and spoon or fork to deal with avocados, it's now just this one thing. Each part of the tool does it's job really well, and it's easy to clean. Love it so much. Even if you're not a clever tool kinda person, just get it. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kikikitten

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the keto diet and eat at least one avocado a day. Normally, after using the knife to open, smaller knife to slice, and a spoon to scoop, it's really a lot of utensils.. Until I found this. Cuts through the avocado just like a knife, is simple and clean to remove the pit, and creates perfect slices, all in one. On top of that it just takes a rinse under the hot water to clean. It's really a genius product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, not practical
customer_reviews.text: I love gadgets so I bought this, but it's kind of a pain in the butt. It's harder to clean than using a plain knife, and even though it works perfectly well, it's really not an improvement over using a knife. I ended up with more avocado on my hands than normal because of flipping this thing around to use both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but if I had to go back, I probably would not have ordered it again. The avocado has to be the perfect size, which if you have touched an avocado, you know that they all vary in size. The pit also needs to be large enough to remove it, but some of the smaller pits, I have to end up removing it with a knife. I can't seem to get clean slices like I can with a knife. The product itself it study and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one tool for avocado lovers
customer_reviews.text: I eat avocados all the time. This tool makes opening/pitting/slicing/scooping super easy and eliminates the need to mess around with a knife/spoon/etc. After heavy use, it has held up well against tons of avocados — even harder/less ripe ones. Overall great tool to have in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Chic

customer_reviews.title: Good multi use item for avocado
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for what it is. Maybe with a bit more practice the slices will be a bit more even and come completely out of the skin. I do like the component to remove the pit. Im not stabbing the avo with a knife and potentially my hand...it is a sturdy kitchen item and I'm glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Convinced my doubtful wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife was doubtful when I got it. (We don't need another kitchen utensil, she said.) BUT - when it came she was OK with it. I really like the seed remover - it saves my fingers from accidentally getting whacked. The only reason it only got four stars is the avocado scooper/cutter piece. If you have smaller avocadoes, you are fine. We get the huge Costco fruits and the slicer is not quite big enough all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: NOT dishwasher safe! Melted in the dishwasher before I had the chance to use it
customer_reviews.author: Dthomas

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective
customer_reviews.text: I’m clumsy, so I chose this because I felt safer with a plastic blade than a metal one. I use this nearly every day and I LOVE it. It’s easy and effective. I don’t think I could cut myself with it If I tried, but it works perfectly on the avocado. My only complaint is that the slicer end is hard to hand wash, but I just toss it in the dishwasher. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: AnyCozy

customer_reviews.title: So Much “Appeal”
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but why did I wait so long? I decided to purchase this over stainless steel, b/c I just didn’t want to deal with potential rusting. Besides, if your avocados are ripe, this would perform well. I think I also bought it since it is BPA free for those that are concerned. The only metal parts are when you place this slicer over the pit to dig into it and then you pull out the pit. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: It good
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who is heavy handed like me, the tip of the plastic (where it’s the thinnest) blade bent a little the very first time I used it. But after I got a handle on its balance it works pretty dope. Before I would use a small chiefs knife to cut, but my husband instead on this because sometimes cheap avocados have tiny seeds and my knife would fall through it and almost cut my hand. I thought it was kind of fun, like I live on the edge but this tool is cool too because i can feel like a avocado top chief. My husband can feel safe again leaving me in the kitchen alone. Happy spouse, peaceful house.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Benard

customer_reviews.title: A must have for avocado toast lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? This is worth just for the part of the tool that removes the pit. Makes it so much easier to make my avocado toast! The knife is lacking a little bit, doesn't work great on larger avocados, but that isn't a big deal to me...love the depitter and the part for removing the avocado from the peel. So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: If you like avocados, you have to have this tool. Will absolutely save you from slashing your hand getting the pit out. I am starting to like the slicer portion but that works best if the fruit is a little firm and more "sliceable" rather than squishy. I actually loved this tool so much that I went and bought 5 more for my avocado loving friends... seriously, i DID!!! :o)
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: If you eat avocados, you need this tool.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally believe in specialty kitchen tools. My husband bought this for me as a joke after I sliced thru my finger trying to remove an avocado seed and had to get stitches. Needless to say, this tool is wonderful! We eat a lot of avocados, and now I don’t have to worry about anyone getting hurt! So easy my kids can use it. Easy to clean! I have no complaints for this product, except I should’ve bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: TikTok made me buy it. I like the part that removes the pit the best. It’s a fun little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I'd give this 20/10 stars
customer_reviews.text: I recently stabbed myself with a knife taking me to the ER while trying to take the pit out of the avocado! I immediately took to Amazon to find a tool to make it less likely for this to happen again. Every step from cutting, taking out the pit and removing from the shell is so simple and safe. I'll give this tool to everyone for birthdays or Christmas from now on.
customer_reviews.author: als0427

customer_reviews.title: I eat a lot of avocados. great for everything about avocados.
customer_reviews.text: I love every feature about this all in one tool! I'm not usually one for lots of gadgets in the kitchen because I don't like filling up my limited space. But this one is one i'm glad I have. The plastic knife part is, of course, not super sharp. that would be the only thing I'd change.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerJ

customer_reviews.title: Pits Beware
customer_reviews.text: Wife posting here. . . OMG I LOVE this thing! I always have the hardest time getting pits out of my avocados. . .usually try hitting them with a knife and scaring the crap out of my husband, but got this in the mail and had to try it right away, he was watching as i used it and he feels much more at ease about my accident prone self eating avocados now with this handy dandy tool! Bought just for the pitter but the slicers work great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hyde

customer_reviews.title: THE RIGHT TOOL FOR THE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are having a great time with our new Avocado Slicer. We have finally found a tool that does it all with a lot less mess. We now can decorate a plate set out for our guests or simply prepare guacamole for special treats for everyone. I would recommend this to every household that love to enjoy Avocado & Guacamole preparation. JMC.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for avocado lovers
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont like to buy products that are only used for one food, but my family and I East so many avocados that I felt purchasing this was justified. This makes avocado prep a whole lot faster. My favorite feature of the tool is the pit remover. So clever!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This item really works the way they claim it does. How refreshing is that? 13 months later: I've used this slicer for more than a year, and I'm still pleased with it! I've never seen an easier way to remove an avocado pit, and the cutting and slicing aspects are easy also. You don't have to get "avocado goo" all over your hands, either! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Relics

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for prepping avocados
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent to use! From cutting open the avocado to scooping out the pre-cut slices, it's pretty easy to use (on a just ripe avocado that is). The "knife" portion is a little sharp, so be careful if you're letting children use it. It's also pretty easy to clean up, if you do it right after using it. I would recommend it for those who have carpel tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Game changing kitchen tool...slightly annoying to clean, but worth the effort!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen tool is a game changer! I especially love the pitter! The only downfall is the avocado slicer gets avocado stuck in between the blades sometimes, but the dishwasher can usually get it clean. Ultimately the bit of a nuisance about cleaning it is well worth how much easier it makes to prep avocados!
customer_reviews.author: SBerger120

customer_reviews.title: Avocado eaters MUST buy!
customer_reviews.text: 3 in 1 tool -cuts to open avocado - pop the seed out by twisting the “hole part” around the seed -use the slice part to slice the avocado into perfect long pieces This is the most useful, safe, fast and convenient tool for opening and eating an avocado! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: ??? Personally I need help with this thing
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time with this. It smashes mine and I never get the nice cuts like shown. It doesn't take the pit out easily all the time. Idk if it's just me struggling with this. I thought I just had to have it since we are always eating them
customer_reviews.author: Miss.Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not really worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun to use but the slicer side, the most helpful part of the tool, doesn’t work that well when the avocado is ripe (and we know you have like 30 seconds for the perfect ripeness moment). Best to just use a paring knife.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Functional as all get out!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and 9 year old daughter love avocados. They both use this thing every. Single. Day. In less than a minute, their avocado is cut, cored, and sliced. It's sharp enough to cut through, but not so sharp that it poses any danger to our 9 year old using it. It's also dishwasher safe so cleaning it up is simple. With the use it gets, easily worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: WalleeCee

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Super happy about this product. Works great with the slicing (which I was worried about) works great on getting pits out most of the time. Have had a few struggles with the pits due to the size. No more using multiple tools to slice up and use avocado, all in one tool!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!! Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver I’ve been looking for something to help me get all of the avocado out of the shell and this thing is awesome . Not only does it take the hard seed out with no avocado attached to it it also slices it perfectly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Ceecee

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy safe way to dissect an Avocado.
customer_reviews.text: Love it ~ saw it demonstrated on a cooking show. I eat avocados 3-4 x week and always fight getting the pit out. This tool has a "pit grasper" that pulls it right out. Easy & safe ~ much better way to remove pit. The slicer part works great, too, unless the flesh is too soft ~ still gets it all out but squishes it (to be expected). Would make a great stocking stuffer gift for an avocado-loving friend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: This product is ok but I think I would rather just use a knife and spoon.
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok but I think I would rather just use a knife and spoon. The knife and pit removal part of the device work well but the slicer just kind of mushes the avocado and a lot of the avocado is still inside the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Remanjon (Lilo)

customer_reviews.title: pretty good but
customer_reviews.text: all of this product works except the slicer. It doesn't work very well even on ripe avocado. Everything else works fantastic! I really love the pit remover.. Thinking the end piece would work well for slicing since the slicer is ineffective ....
customer_reviews.author: Ali Beethe

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips 3-in-1 Avocado Slicer
product_meta.description:
Design:Avocado SlicerSplit, pit, slice and scoop avocados safely and effectively with the OXO Good Grips 3-in-1 Avocado Slicer. This tool features a comfortable non-slip grip and a blade that easily cuts avocados to their core without being sharp to the touch. The stainless steel center removes the pit with one quick twist. Use the fan blade to cut the ripe, delicious fruit into seven perfect pieces. Green body. Top-rack dishwasher safe.

BRAND STORY
By OXO
feature_bullets: All in one tool splits, pits and slices avocados
Stainless steel pitter removes pit with one quick twist
Slicer lifts fruit from skin in seven perfect pieces

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars10,746 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
